media_manager.plugins.batchdownloadmanager.downloaders.TwistedDownloader module¶

Bases: object

Wrapper for Gregory Eric Sanderson Turcot Temlett MacDonnell Forbes’s XDCC Downloader The plan is to replace his script with one of my own once twisted supports python 3.
